sense.gloss: cumulative total, accumulated total, total up to now
successive promotion, gradual progression, rising step by step
dependents, family members that one has to support
encumbrances, things that tie one down

sdata.j: アメリカ↑人↑↓じん↓が↑貿易↑↓ぼうえき↓↑赤字↑↓あかじ↓を↑累積↑↓るいせき↓したのは、↑限度↑↓げんど↓を↑超↑↓こ↓えたぜいたくをしたからですよ。
sdata.e: Americans accumulated their trade deficits by living far beyond their means.

sdata.j: ↑回収↑↓かいしゅう↓↑対象↑↓たいしょう↓のソニー↑製↑↓せい↓↑充電↑↓じゅうでん↓↑池↑↓ち↓は↑累計↑↓るいけい↓で７６５↑万↑↓まん↓９０００↑個↑↓こ↓となった。
sdata.e: The amount of Sony rechargeable batteries supposed to be collected totalled 7,659,000 units.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はその↑後↑↓ご↓、↑累進↑↓るいしん↓して↑社長↑↓しゃちょう↓にまで↑進↑↓すす↓んだ。
sdata.e: Thereafter, he was gradually promoted until he became company president.

sdata.j: ↑回収↑↓かいしゅう↓↑対象↑↓たいしょう↓のソニー↑製↑↓せい↓↑充電↑↓じゅうでん↓↑池↑↓ち↓は↑累計↑↓るいけい↓で７６５↑万↑↓まん↓９０００↑個↑↓こ↓となった。
sdata.e: The number of Sony rechargeable batteries supposed to be collected totalled 7,659,000 units.

words.gloss: cumulative total, accumulated total, total up to now
